atk-abh02a1:2_1: Idāni tadanantare āyatanavibhaṅganiddese suttantabhājanīyaṁ tāva dassento dvādasāyatanāni cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpāyatanantiādimāha.
atk-abh02a1:6_3: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṁtaṁdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭṭenti vāyamantīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a1:6_4: Te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārentīti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a1:6_5: Idañca anamatagge saṁsāre pavattaṁ atīva āyataṁ saṁsāradukkhaṁ yāva na nivattati tāva nayanteva,
atk-abh02a1:6_7: Iti sabbepi me dhammā āyatanato āyānaṁ tananato āyatassa ca nayanato ‘āyatanaṁ āyatana’nti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a1:7_5: Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṁ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṁ āyatananti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:7_7: Sāsane pana “manorame āyatane sevanti naṁ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:7_9: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:8_0: Cakkhurūpādīsu cāpi te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo nesaṁ nivāsanaṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:8_1: Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā taṁ nissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayo nesaṁ ākaro.
atk-abh02a1:8_12: kāraṇaṭṭhenāti imehi kāraṇehi ete dhammā ‘āyatanaṁ āyatana’nti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a1:8_13: Tasmā yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṁ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe…
atk-abh02a1:8_14: dhammā ca te āyatanañcāti dhammāyatananti evaṁ tāvettha ‘atthato’ viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a1:9_1: Tāni ca pana nesaṁ lakkhaṇāni heṭṭhā rūpakaṇḍaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:10_3: Evaṁ sati dhammāyatanamicceva avatvā kasmā dvādasāyatanāni vuttānīti ce?
atk-abh02a1:10_5: Idha channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ dvārabhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena ca vavatthānato ayameva tesaṁ bhedo hotīti dvādasa vuttāni.
atk-abh02a1:10_11: Iti channaṁ viññāṇakāyānaṁ uppattidvārārammaṇavavatthānato dvādasa vuttānīti.
atk-abh02a1:11_0: ‘Kamato’ti idhāpi pubbe vuttesu uppattikkamādīsu desanākkamova yujjati.
atk-abh02a1:11_1: Ajjhattikesu hi āyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighavisayattā cakkhāyatanaṁ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṁ desitaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:11_3: Atha vā dassanānuttariyasavanānuttariyahetubhāvena bahūpakārattā ajjhattikesu cakkhāyatanasotāyatanāni paṭhamaṁ desitāni.
atk-abh02a1:11_6: Cakkhādīnaṁ pana gocarattā tassa tassa anantarāni bāhiresu rūpāyatanādīni.
atk-abh02a1:11_7: Apica viññāṇuppattikāraṇavavatthānatopi ayameva tesaṁ kamo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a1:11_8: Vuttañhetaṁ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ…pe…
atk-abh02a1:11_9: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇa”nti evaṁ ‘kamato’pettha viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-abh02a1:12_0: ‘Saṅkhepavitthārā’ti saṅkhepato hi manāyatanassa ceva dhammāyatanekadesassa ca nāmena,
atk-abh02a1:12_1: tadavasesānañca āyatanānaṁ rūpena saṅgahitattā dvādasāpi āyatanāni nāmarūpamattameva honti.
atk-abh02a1:13_0: Vitthārato pana ajjhattikesu tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ jātivasena cakkhupasādamattameva,
atk-abh02a1:14_0: ‘Daṭṭhabbato’ti ettha pana sabbānevetāni āyatanāni anāgamanato aniggamanato ca daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:14_1: Na hi tāni pubbe udayā kutoci āgacchanti,
atk-abh02a1:14_9: ‘aho vata amhākaṁ sāmaggiyā viññāṇaṁ nāma uppajjeyyā’ti,
atk-abh02a1:14_10: na ca tāni viññāṇuppādanatthaṁ dvārabhāvena vatthubhāvena ārammaṇabhāvena vā īhanti,
atk-abh02a1:14_12: atha kho dhammatāvesā yaṁ cakkhurūpādīnaṁ sāmaggiyaṁ cakkhuviññāṇādīni sambhavanti.
atk-abh02a1:14_14: Apica ajjhattikāni suññagāmo viya daṭṭhabbāni dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitattā,
atk-abh02a1:14_19: Apica ajjhattikāni cha pāṇakā viya daṭṭhabbāni,
atk-abh02a1:15_0: Idāni tesaṁ vipassitabbākāraṁ dassetuṁ cakkhuṁ aniccantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:15_1: Tattha cakkhu tāva hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:16_1: Yasmā vā etaṁ uppannaṁ ṭhitiṁ pāpuṇāti,
atk-abh02a1:17_1: Yasmā vā etaṁ uppannaṁ ṭhitiṁ mā pāpuṇātu,
atk-abh02a1:17_3: jarappataṁ mā bhijjatūti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu kassaci vasavattibhāvo natthi,
atk-abh02a1:18_13: Cakkhu pana cakkhu ceva anattā cāti.
atk-abh02a1:19_0: Imasmiṁ pana suttantabhājanīye tathāgatena kiṁ dassitanti?
atk-abh02a1:19_2: Sammāsambuddho hi anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassento aniccena vā dasseti,
atk-abh02a1:19_9: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a1:19_11: cakkhu attāti yo vadeyya iti cakkhu anattā”ti.
atk-abh02a1:19_23: rūpaṁ anattā tasmā rūpaṁ ābādhāya saṁvattati;
atk-abh02a1:19_26: evaṁ me rūpaṁ mā ahosī”ti imasmiṁ sutte dukkhena anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassesi. “Rūpaṁ,
atk-abh02a1:19_32: na meso attā”tiādīsu aniccadukkhehi anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassesi. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a1:20_0: Hatthato hi taṭṭake vā sarake vā kismiñcideva vā patitvā bhinne ‘aho anicca’nti vadanti.
atk-abh02a1:20_2: Attabhāvasmiṁ pana gaṇḍapiḷakādīsu vā uṭṭhitāsu khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi vā viddhāsu ‘aho dukkha’nti vadanti.
atk-abh02a1:20_4: Anattalakkhaṇaṁ apākaṭaṁ andhakāraṁ avibhūtaṁ duppaṭivijjhaṁ duddīpanaṁ duppaññāpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:20_5: Aniccadukkhalakkhaṇāni uppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā paññāyanti.
atk-abh02a1:20_8: Mahiddhikā hi mahānubhāvā tāpasaparibbājakā sarabhaṅgasatthārādayopi ‘aniccaṁ dukkha’nti vattuṁ sakkonti,
atk-abh02a1:20_10: Sace hi te sampattaparisāya anattāti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyuṁ,
atk-abh02a1:20_15: Tasmā satthā anattalakkhaṇaṁ dassento aniccena vā dassesi,
atk-abh02a1:20_18: Idha pana taṁ aniccadukkhehi dassesīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:21_0: Imāni pana lakkhaṇāni kissa amanasikārā appaṭivedhā,
atk-abh02a1:21_12: Udayabbayaṁ pana pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:21_13: Abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṁ manasikatvā iriyāpathe ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:21_14: Nānādhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhoge kate anattalakkhaṇaṁ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a1:22_8: “Yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti vacanato pana tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ dukkhaṁ. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a1:22_11: “Yaṁ dukkhaṁ taṁ anattā”ti pana vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṁ anattā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a1:22_18: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyoti idañhi sabbampi aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā nāma.
atk-abh02a1:26_1: Abhidhammabhājanīye yathā heṭṭhā vipassakānaṁ upakāratthāya “cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpāyatana”nti yugalato āyatanāni vuttāni,
atk-abh02a1:26_2: tathā avatvā ajjhattikabāhirānaṁ sabbākārato sabhāvadassanatthaṁ “cakkhāyatanaṁ sotāyatana”nti evaṁ ajjhattikabāhiravavatthānanayena vuttāni.
atk-abh02a1:27_0: 156. Tesaṁ niddesavāre tattha katamaṁ cakkhāyatanantiādīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:28_1: Yaṁ panetaṁ dhammāyatananiddese “tattha katamā asaṅkhatā dhātu?
atk-abh02a1:29_8: idaṁ vuccati nibbāna”nti etaṁ jambukhādakasuttaṁ āharitvā ‘iminā suttena veditabbaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānaṁ nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a1:29_11: ‘kiṁ pana yathā cetaṁ suttaṁ tathā attho’ti?
atk-abh02a1:29_23: idaṁ vuccati arahatta”nti idaṁ tassevānantaraṁ ābhatasuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:30_3: Nibbānaṁ sacchikatvā viharanto dhammasenāpati nibbānaṁ pucchitopi arahattaṁ pucchitopi kilesakkhayameva āha.
atk-abh02a1:30_4: Kiṁ pana nibbānañca arahattañca ekaṁ udāhu nāna’nti?
atk-abh02a1:30_6: Ko ettha tayā atibahuṁ cuṇṇīkaraṇaṁ karontena attho’?
atk-abh02a1:30_8: Nanu ñāte sādhu hotī’ti evaṁ punappunaṁ pucchito vañcetuṁ asakkonto āha –
atk-abh02a1:30_9: ‘rāgādīnaṁ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’ti vuccatīti.
atk-abh02a1:30_12: Lañjaṁ datvāpi taṁ vadāpento etadeva vadāpeyya.
atk-abh02a1:30_13: Yatheva ca te etaṁ vibhajitvā kathitaṁ,
atk-abh02a1:30_15: nibbānañhi āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a1:31_0: Sace evaṁ vutte saññattiṁ gacchati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ; no ce,
atk-abh02a1:31_4: Dosakkhayo nāma dosasseva khayo udāhu rāgamohānampi?
atk-abh02a1:31_5: Mohakkhayo nāma mohasseva khayo udāhu rāgadosānampī’ti?
atk-abh02a1:32_4: tiṇṇaṁ akusalamūlānaṁ khaye tīṇi nibbānāni honti,
atk-abh02a1:32_12: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti.
atk-abh02a1:32_14: Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:33_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti,
atk-abh02a1:33_4: Tava vāde acchadīpimigamakkaṭādayo nibbānappattā nāma honti.
atk-abh02a1:33_7: Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:34_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti,
atk-abh02a1:34_14: Tvaṁ akhīṇesuyeva kilesesu kilesakkhayaṁ nibbānaṁ paññapesi,
atk-abh02a1:34_17: Evaṁ pana aggahetvā nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:35_0: Sace pana evaṁ vuttepi na sallakkheti,
atk-abh02a1:35_8: ‘khīṇāti vā khīyissantīti vā vattuṁ na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a1:35_13: Maggo katamaṁ kilesakkhayaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā katame kilese khepeti?
atk-abh02a1:35_15: Nibbānaṁ pana āgamma rāgādayo khīṇāti ekameva nibbānaṁ rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a1:36_6: “Evaṁ avijjā ca taṇhā ca taṁ āgamma,
atk-abh02a1:37_0: Idhāpi dasāyatanāni kāmāvacarāni, dve pana catubhūmakāni lokiyalokuttaramissakānīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh02a1:40_1: Idhāpi pañhāpucchake yaṁ labbhati yañca na labbhati,
atk-abh02a1:40_2: taṁ sabbaṁ pucchitvā labbhamānavaseneva vissajjanaṁ vuttaṁ;
atk-abh02a1:40_5: Idha pana dasannaṁ āyatanānaṁ rūpabhāvena abyākatatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a1:40_6: Dvinnaṁ āyatanānaṁ khandhavibhaṅge catunnaṁ khandhānaṁ viya kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a1:40_7: Kevalañhi cattāro khandhā sappaccayāva saṅkhatāva dhammāyatanaṁ pana “siyā appaccayaṁ,
atk-abh02a1:40_9: Ārammaṇattikesu ca anārammaṇaṁ sukhumarūpasaṅkhātaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ na-
atk-abh02a1:40_11: Tañca kho anārammaṇattā na parittādibhāvena navattabbadhammārammaṇattāti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh02a1:40_13: Idhāpi hi cattāro khandhā viya dvāyatanā pañcapaṇṇāsa kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha rajjantassa dussantassa
atk-abh02a1:40_14: muyhantassa saṁvarantassa sammasantassa paccavekkhantassa ca parittārammaṇāti sabbaṁ khandhesu vuttasadisamevāti.
